Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Djedher with painted detail: a dark blue lappet-wig(damaged at the back), a modelled face with a dark blue beard, parallel hands in relief holding an adze, a hoe and the cord of a seed-bag which hangs over one shoulder, the front of the legs is inscribed with painted blue Hieroglyphs(now worn) within a blue border, there is a back pillar and a plinth(damaged) beneath the feet.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
